name: A
details: When your patients are browsing their Facebook feeds, they're seeing countless stock photos, advertisements, and other posts that they just scroll on past. One of the best ways to catch their attention and get them to engage with your practice is to share photos and posts about real people. Your staff, your patients, yourself. Put faces to your practice. Be real. You might be surprised to see how much engagement a simple post like the one below wishing a staff member a happy birthday actually gets.
